item.title: Network Hacking 1010
item.author: bradinrohde0@gmail.com (Bradin Rohde)
item.description: I was asked to give a 5 minute presentation on the basics of network hacking for the Intro to Cybersecurity class. The goal was to demonstrate the importance of thinking like an attacker in order to defend yourself.
